prod_desc.heading: Why buy Realme Pad WiFi + 4G Android Tablet
features: 6.9mm Ultra Slim Design sleek and stylish
8MP Ultra Wide-angle Camera For high quality pictures
7100mAh Mega Battery for non stop usage
Dolby Atmos Quad Speakers Unparalleled music experience
Helio G80 Gaming Processor for smooth operationHelio G80 Gaming Processor for smooth operation
sub_features: Bring home the Realme Pad WiFi + 4G Android Tablet with extraordinary features. It is built with Helio G80 Gaming Processor to take the gaming to the next level as it is more portable and better for casual activities such as browsing the web, watching videos or playing games. It is convenient and easy to look at it is just 6.9mm in thickness 440g weight born to let you imagine and play on the go. Its seamless metal exterior keeps it slim and feather-light for true portability. Slip it into a tote with ease, hold it for hours without fatigue, and feast your eyes on its sleek minimalist look. Built in with Dolby Atmos Quad Speakers you will no longer need cinema tickets and enjoy realme Pad's crystal-clear surround sound pumping from quad speakers with smart PA for powerful bass. Thanks to Adaptive Surround Sound, you'll get the best stereo no matter how you hold it.

It is equipped with 8MP HD Front & Rear Camera that lets you take clean and crisp, high quality pictures, perfect for video calls and video conferencing. Realme Pad WiFi + 4G Android Tablet was designed specifically for entertainment, with a simplified layout and smooth operation for a unique experience. Need to complete your tasks/work efficiently ? your wait ends with the, Multi-Window Mode can make two apps running simultaneously. That means you can multi-task with ease, browsing the web and reading/chatting with friends at the same time. Reading require more focus on the screen this can cause irritation but with the Dark Mode keeps your eyes comfortable at night so enjoy all your best loved stories or articles. The Night Mode feature protects your eyes by reducing brightness to 2 nits when your lights are turned off. And to top it off it also has a Sunlight Mode ensures you can see your screen clearly outdoors. For healthy childhood development, it is integrated the Google Kids Space, providing a series of applications, videos, and books suitable for children. Kids Space's interface is colorful, cute, and easy to use, and parents can set a screen usage limit and select which applications their children can use.

Take a step ahead to the future with Realme Pad WiFi + 4G Android Tablet as it loaded with additional features that includes: Cast screen to TV, Nearby Share to Smartphones, Smart Watch/Band Unlock realme Pad and Open-up Auto Connection with Earphones providing a great range of connectivity. Never run of space as it has enough space for all your memories. realme Pad can handle multi-tasking with ease, helping you get more done. And with up to 4+64GB RAM & ROM, expandable by up to 1TB, you can hold on to all your beloved videos, photos, games, and beyond. So hurry and get you hands in this Realme Pad WiFi + 4G Android Tablet all in one tablet.

features.title: Battery
features.desc: 7100 mAh Battery With 18 Watts Quick Charge

faqs.que: Is Realme Pad a good tablet?
faqs.ans: The Realme Pad X comes with solid build quality and this is noticeable the moment you pull it out of the box. The back is plastic, but it does not feel flimsy as such. There are no wobbly or mushy buttons. The tablet feels pretty premium in hand given the price.

faqs.que: How long does Realme Pad last?
faqs.ans: They can perform well for up to two years, after which if the software is not updated, it may require constant repair. This is a problem with most Android tablets. It either begins to hang more often, works really slow, or the display shows signs of malfunctions.

faqs.que: Can I use pen on realme Pad?
faqs.ans: The tablet packs stylus support and Realme will sell one –called Realme Pencil— with magnetic wireless charging, up to 10.6 hours of claimed battery life, and a 20Hz sampling rate for Rs 5,499.

faqs.que: Is Realme pad good for reading?
faqs.ans: The Realme Pad Mini gets a 8.7-inch LCD display that is big, but offers a low 1340 x 800 resolution that translates to a not-so-crisp viewing and reading experience.
